{"id":1157858588,"question_id":3275,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1706317149,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1157858588/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word I","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumPushes(String word) {\n        Integer[] count = new Integer[26];\n        int res=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)\n            count[i]=0;\n        \n        for(char ch:word.toCharArray()){\n            count[ch-'a']++;\n        }\n        \n        Arrays.sort(count, Collections.reverseOrder());\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<26;i++){\n            if(count[i]==0)\n                break;\n            res+=(count[i])*(i/8 + 1);\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-pushes-to-type-word-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
